channel.title: Request for TuT > automatic message when a player reaches lv. 99 in a skill
channel.description:
Hello everyone,
I just started my server and I would really like to have an auto-message in it. As on my server, skillcapes are rare, and skilling takes long, I'd really like something like this:
A message like "[i]PLAYERNAME[/i] reached level 99 in [i]SKILLNAME[/i]!" When a player reaches level 99 in any skill, that message will be sent. Including their playername and in which skill they reached it. That would be awesome!
Now I'm requesting someone that can make a code for me, and tell me where I need to place it, as I do not know which file must be editted. :/ And I'm 'kinda' not good in java.
Thanks ALOT if you can help me :D

item.title: Request for TuT > automatic message when a player reaches lv. 99 in a skill
item.dc:creator: @Refive Refive
item.description:
@Refive wrote:

Hello everyone,

I just started my server and I would really like to have an auto-message in it.
As on my server, skillcapes are rare, and skilling takes long, I’d really like something like this:

A message like “PLAYERNAME reached level 99 in SKILLNAME!”
When a player reaches level 99 in any skill, that message will be sent. Including their playername and in which skill they reached it. That would be awesome!

Now I’m requesting someone that can make a code for me, and tell me where I need to place it, as I do not know which file must be editted. And I’m ‘kinda’ not good in java.

Thanks ALOT if you can help me
